description: Regaliz range of [chairs](/categories/seating) is the output of a continuous product research done by Jose Pacheco at the [Barcelona FabLab](http://www.fablabbcn.org/). They were designed with the goal in mind to be produced anywhere using standards digital tools with a result that will structurally withstand on time, while maintaining to a minimum the assembly complexity. It was equally important to achieve a final attractive design aesthetic.
name: Regaliz
